artist: Author: Aaron Cometbus; Publisher: Aaron Cometbus , Berkeley
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Perfect bound volume, photocollage of abstracted lion, designs, and text printed in offset lithography on wove paper covers; 112 pp.
inscription: Title page, black ink pen: (title redacted) birtah DAY / Fly / (drawing of insects and birthday cake) I HOPE / YOU / WIPE / OUT !! / YR THE / BEST !! / WE ALL LOVE YOU, / AND I THANK YOU / SO MUCH FOR EMPHATICALLY / DEMANDING THIS / XO XO AAroN
title: Cometbus, no. 56: A Bestiary of Booksellers
